title: So you're removing DFG.... We still need another AP CDR item.
body:
You're basically forcing people to either get lucidity boots or athenes...  (mind you i also have morellos in mind but thats half of the cdr you're able to get, what about the other half?)

why not just remove DFG active?

Edit: people seem to be taking this the wrong way... I dont like DFG and i like that its being removed, but 120 ap gone from our inventory is HUGE blow! So im just tossing it out there, why don't you just remove the active from DFG and keep it as it or even add 5% cdr to the existing 10%?

I just wanted to correct my self from any understanding / confusion.

replies.body:
Except you think that people buy DFG for the CDR and not the high amounts of AP and the active ability of killing an enemy champion.

And if you need CDR on an AP item, you have more than enough options with Morellonomicon, Athene's, Twin Shadows, Banner of Command, Will of the Ancients, Nashor's Tooth, IGB, and Ardent Censer. At least a couple of those options are bad for AP champs, but most of them are respectable replacements for DFG's cooldown reduction if you need it.

All of which offer mana regen and in no way help resourceless champions...

Is that such a big deal? I mean, look at the manaless AP champions. Kennen, Rumble and Vlad just don't use DFG, it's an acceptable but easily-skipped item for Akali, and Katarina has a rework coming up that will shift her itemization quite a bit (not to mention that she's got a lot of power even without that item). That only really leaves Morde, and he just needs help with or without the item. I'm not sure this is really a big issue for manaless champions. Oh, and Garen. Can't forget Garen. He's not happy.
